forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible this morning with partly cloudy skies for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 54F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some passing clouds. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 13C. Winds NNE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 56F. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 57F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 14C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. SSE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. SSE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 37F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High near 10C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 50F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
